fullContent: Tenure is a defining feature of the US academic system with significant implications for research productivity and creative search. title: Diamondback Warns of Oil Supply Excess
summary: Diamondback Energy expects a jump in crude oil production globally in the second half of the year, which could lead to a glut, the company’s chief executive said in a letter to investors. At current oil prices, production in the shale patch has peaked, Kaes Van’t Hof wrote in the letter, adding that
fullContent: Diamondback Energy expects a jump in crude oil production globally in the second half of the year, which could lead to a glut, the company’s chief executive said in a letter to investors. At current oil prices, production in the shale patch has peaked, Kaes Van’t Hof wrote in the letter, adding that “the likelihood of a massive oil supply glut combined with an oil demand shock seems to have dissipated (on the demand side)”.
